snippet: The interns, who worked for W Magazine and The New Yorker, say they were paid less than $1 an hour.
abstract: Former interns Lauren Ballinger and Matthew Leib file lawsuit against Conde Nast, saying company failed to pay them minimum wage at their summer jobs at W Magazine and The New Yorker; pair ask that it be approved as class-action suit.
lead_paragraph: The interns, who worked for W Magazine and The New Yorker, say they were paid less than $1 an hour.

headline.main: Condé Nast Faces Suit From Interns Over Wages
headline.print_headline: Condé Nast Faces Suit From Interns Over Wages
